page.title: 16RECREATION (i)
page.content: The village hall is the venue for the majority of the meetings of the following. Mother & Toddler group for the under fours meets weekly for 2 hours, cost 50p. Monday Club is a church based activity for junior children, about 20 attend. The Youth Club is a social meeting of young people organised by a youth leader, weekly meetings and occasional outings are organised. The Women's Institute meets monthly, with a membership of about 20.In a small way they contributeto the ideals of the national movement by their social concern, both locally nd ntionwide and the education of their members.
